start.instructions.title: How to play?
start.instructions.items: The goal of the game is to reach the destination Wikipedia article from the starting article.
You must navigate through the links in the articles.
Try to get there in as few clicks as possible!
start.search.title: Select the articles
start.search.origin.title: Origin
start.search.destination.title: Destination
congrats.title: Congratulations!
congrats.gamePath.title: Your path
congrats.stats.title: You found the path from {0} to {1}
congrats.stats.performance.good: Excellent work! You know your way well.
congrats.stats.performance.normal: Well done! Your knowledge led you to the destination.
congrats.stats.performance.default: You did it! Keep practicing to improve your score.
congrats.stats.clicks.title: Clicks
congrats.stats.time.title: Time
